(I didn't want to have to do this, Zardus.  Unicron never died.  Hot Rod 
didn't kill him ('cause he's no Optimus Prime!) as it was shown in the post 
movie episodes.  How Unicron got to Earth is still a mystery, and he's 
sixteen feet tall.  Far from superpowerful though)
